HomePage.title: Simplify the management of your Tesla Supercharger invoices ⚡️
HomePage.description: Securely connect your Tesla account to our service and automatically receive a daily email with all your Supercharger invoices.
HomePage.benefits:
• 💼 Save time: No need to search for your invoices; they come to you.
  • 🔒 Guaranteed security: Your data is protected and used only to retrieve your invoices.
  • 📩 Automated service: Receive a clear and organized email every day with all your invoices.
HomePage.cta: Get started now and focus on what matters most: your journeys 🚗⚡️.

Emails.title: Emails
Emails.description: Emails to send the invoice to
